growth_opportunities.opportunity_description: Promote to Stable and enable by default in the Analytics Dashboard.

rationale.why_now: The feature is mature, low-risk, and adds immediate visual value to the analytics experience.
rationale.user_benefit: Users get better insights into their practice quality without any additional effort.
rationale.business_benefit: Higher engagement with the analytics dashboard.
rationale.technical_readiness: 95% ready. Only needs default value change and minor cleanup.

phase_1.name: Default Enablement
phase_1.go_no_go_criteria: No negative impact on dashboard load time.

required_work.task: Change defaultValue to true in lib/feature-flags.ts
Add unit tests for heatmap data processing

rollback_plan.trigger: If dashboard load time increases by > 500ms

growth_opportunities.opportunity_description: Implement the Web Worker adapter for the PitchDetector to improve mobile performance.

rationale.why_now: Mobile users are reporting audio crackling and UI jank during practice sessions.
rationale.user_benefit: Smoother practice experience on lower-end devices.

phase_1.name: Worker Adapter Implementation
phase_1.go_no_go_criteria: Detection accuracy remains equal to main thread.

prioritized_queue.impact_if_successful: Improved user value and feature awareness.

next_30_days_focus: Complete Web Worker prototype for Pitch Detection
